channel.title: Attacked
channel.description: I think moparisthebest.com got attacked again, it's very slow and has no connection.

item.title: Attacked
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Taharok:

Oh, in that case, I’m sure they can’t be prevented. Unless of course, all members are banned. Only then will the questions stop.

Read full topic

item.title: Attacked
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:20, topic:250368”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=330186.msg2608605#msg2608605 date=1230669360]
When Moparisthebest.com was first being attacked, Mopar randomly changed the port the website ran over. This combined with his redirection page to that port prevented the attack altogether.
[/quote]

The “That’s what you think” was refering to the questions on moparscape.[/quote]

Oh, in that case, I’m sure they can’t be prevented. Unless of course, all members are banned. Only then will the questions stop.

Read full topic

item.title: Attacked
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:17, topic:250368”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=330186.msg2600319#msg2600319 date=1230186409]
lol’d, too bad only the first can be prevented. =p
[/quote]

That’s what you think.[/quote]

When Moparisthebest.com was first being attacked, Mopar randomly changed the port the website ran over. This combined with his redirection page to that port prevented the attack altogether.

item.title: Attacked
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:15, topic:250368”][quote author=Wrauld link=topic=330186.msg2599134#msg2599134 date=1230137734]

[quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=330186.msg2581736#msg2581736 date=1229285413]

It is on the same box.

And thanks for letting me know, it is loading very fast for me now though, is anyone else having problems?

Usually happens everyday for me around 3:00 and later.

doesn’t that tell you something?
[/quote]That all the kiddies get out of school, pull out their massive botnets that they hide everyday from the feds, and begin attacking the site? Sure.

No kiddies overload the site with questions which is almost the same as a major DDOS considering how many questions there are everyday…
[/quote]Botnets and questions are the same thing on Moparscape.org; they’re both extremely stupid.[/quote]

lol’d, too bad only the first can be prevented. =p

Read full topic

item.title: Attacked
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:10, topic:250368”][quote author=bootnecklad link=topic=330186.msg2580902#msg2580902 date=1229247271]

And thanks for letting me know, it is loading very fast for me now though, is anyone else having problems?

Usually happens everyday for me around 3:00 and later.

doesn’t that tell you something?
[/quote]

It tells me several things, but it isn’t my job to figure them out.[/quote]

Well why don’t you list them then we can figure them out.
